original_title: IMF Representatives to Visit Sri Lanka for Economic Assessment
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A team of representatives from the International Monetary Fund (IMF) is set to visit Sri Lanka on January 11th, 2024, for a crucial evaluation of the country's economic situation.
The Ministry of Finance confirmed the visit, stating that the mission aims to assess recent trends in the Sri Lankan economy and the progress made on ongoing economic reforms.
